channel.title: How do I replace some sound ??
channel.description: [b]I want some sound effect from HL1 to be in this game eg. Med Kit picking sound, Opening weapon hud sound etc. I already have HL1 sounds what should I do ? I have no experience about modding. Anyone has a guide for doing this ? In workshop there aren't everything I want so I decide to create what myself.[/b] [b]I don't want to create an advance mod such as texture but only sound replacing. Thank you :slight_smile: [/b]

item.title: How do I replace some sound ??
item.dc:creator: Aonthut
item.description:
I want some sound effect from HL1 to be in this game eg. Med Kit picking sound, Opening weapon hud sound etc. I already have HL1 sounds what should I do ? I have no experience about modding. Anyone has a guide for doing this ? In workshop there aren’t everything I want so I decide to create what myself.
I don’t want to create an advance mod such as texture but only sound replacing.
Thank you

Read full topic
item.source: How do I replace some sound ??
